channel.title: Error Connecting to Server
channel.description: OK, well I'm using DeltaScape Client to log onto my server, but when ever i try to log on it say's "Error Connecting to Server" I don't know why it says that. When i run the server, i do the following: 1. Click on run.bat, 2. Open up uTorrent to portforward it, 3. I try to log in. Any suggestions? and if i use localhost or 127.0.0.1 it works. WTF?Ill [rep++] :D

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @Uwogo Uwogo
item.description:
@Uwogo wrote:

A multiple thread is not necessary.

Read full topic
